text: Ashley Rickards (b. May 4, 1992) is an American actress. She has appeared in both television series and movies. She played the role of Mandy, the autistic girl, in the 2011 independent movie Fly Away. She also played Jenna Hamilton in Awkward on MTV. Rickards was born in Sarasota, Florida. ==References== Category:Actors from Sarasota, Florida Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:1992 births Category:Living people
title: Ashley Rickards
